label: Filler Phase
description: Between 2-minute burst windows, maintain Death's Design, build resources with the basic combo and Soul Slice, and spend Soul Reavers on Gibbet/Gallows. Avoid overcapping gauges.

steps.reasoning: Start the 1-2-3 basic combo. Each hit generates 10 Soul gauge. This is your bread-and-butter GCD filler.
Second combo hit. 400 potency when comboed. Continue building Soul gauge.
Third combo hit, highest potency in the basic chain (500). Completes the combo cycle.
Use charges on cooldown to avoid overcapping. Generates 50 Soul gauge per use. Save 1 charge for burst if Arcane Circle is coming within 8s.
Refresh Death's Design when less than 30s remains on the debuff. Critical: never let it fall off, but don't clip too early either.
Spend Soul gauge when at 50+ to avoid overcapping. Grants Soul Reaver for a Gibbet or Gallows.
Spend Soul Reaver from Blood Stalk. Alternate with Gallows based on Enhanced buff. Generates 10 Shroud.
Spend Soul Reaver. Alternate with Gibbet. Continue building Shroud gauge toward 50 for Enshroud entry at 60s mark.
